name: Information Integration Group, Inc.
tagline: IIG is a Leading ISV, VAR and Software Developer
description:
As a leading North American ISV and provider of ERP and business management software solutions, IIG is particularly proud of its 23 years of exceptional service to clients in the manufacturing and distribution sectors, and in the apparel, rental, and field services industries nationwide. To date, IIG’s in-house team of experienced programmers has developed hundreds of customized software enhancements to meet the specific requirements of its valued customers.
IIG is a long-time Sage Business Partner and is certified to sell and support Sage 100 ERP, Sage 500 ERP, and Sage ERP X3. Further, in an effort to expand into new software solution offerings leveraging cloud computing technology, IIG recently became a NetSuite Solution Provider.
